## Installation

You can install the development version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("RobelTakele/AquaBEHER2")
```

Then you can attach the package `AquaBEHER2`:

```{r eval = FALSE}
library("AquaBEHER2")
```
